threads.latestCommentText: the trick is to give the hanging object an upward facing center at the hanging axis, and a script that tells it to face up. make it a subthing of a handle, and it will hang

threads.title: teleporter help
threads.latestCommentText: basically you create any object (can be invisible) with a distinct name, say "marker1", place it, then have another script use e.g. "when touched then send nearby onto marker1"
